dialogues.speaker: Captain Orion
dialogues.text: We're approaching the planet Xylophia-IV. Prepare the away team for landing.

dialogues.speaker: Lieutenant Commander Zara
dialogues.text: Aye, Captain. But I'm reading strange energy signatures coming from the surface. It may not be safe to land.

dialogues.speaker: Captain Orion
dialogues.text: I see it too, Zara. Take a team and scan for any signs of alien life or technology. We'll proceed with caution.

dialogues.speaker: Narrator
dialogues.text: As the away team descends to the planet's surface, they notice an eerie silence. No birds chirping, no rustling leaves. Just an unsettling stillness.

dialogues.speaker: Lieutenant Winston
dialogues.text: Captain, we're reading something big here... a structure of some kind. It's emitting a powerful energy field.
